Package Figures

Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
Figures.GeometricFigure
Figures.Polygon
public class Polygon extends GeometricFigure
Class that creates and manipulates polygons.

  • Constructor Details

    • Polygon

      public Polygon(String s)
      Constructor for a polygon.
      Parameters:
      s - string in the format "n x1 y1 x2 y2 ... xn yn"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string is invalid or the polygon has less than 3 vertices

  • Method Details

    • translatePoints

      protected Point[] translatePoints(double dx, double dy)
      Moves all points of the polygon by dx units on the x-axis and dy units on the y-axis.
      Parameters:
      dx - units to be moved on the x-axis
      dy - units to be moved on the y-axis
      Returns:
      an array of all new points with the shifted positions

    • pointsToString

      protected String pointsToString(Point[] points)
      Converts an array of points into a string.
      Parameters:
      points - array of points
      Returns:
      string with the points in the format "x1 y1 x2 y2 ... xn yn"
